casebody.data:
DESMOND
v.
The NEWS & OBSERVER PUBLISHING COMPANY, et al. 132PA18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 John A. Bussian, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The News And Observer Publishing Company, et al. James T. Johnson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Desmond, Beth. Chynna T. Smith, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Desmond, Beth. Bradley R. Kutrow, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for The News And Observer Publishing Company, et al. Julia C. Ambrose, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The News And Observer Publishing Company, et al. William M. Wilson, III, Attorney at Law, for Professor William Van Alstyne. Jonathan E. Buchan, Attorney at Law, for The Reporters Committee for Freedom of Press, et al. Mark J. Prak, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The News And Observer Publishing Company, et al. Timothy Nelson, Attorney at Law, for The News And Observer Publishing Company, et al. Wade M. Smith, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Locke, Mandy.

*826The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of June 2019 by Defendant (Mandy Locke) for Additional Time for Oral Argument:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
